item.title: Arg. Help would be nice :D

item.description:
@Leecher_Ian wrote:

if((itemUsed == 6529 && useWith == 430)) {
if (playerHasItemAmount(6529, 125) == true) {
deleteItem(6529, getItemSlot(6529), 125);
deleteItem(430, getItemSlot(430), 1);
addItem(14638, 1);
sendMessage(“You get a figher torso!”);
} else if (playerHasItemAmount(6529, 125) == false) {
}

item.title: Arg. Help would be nice :D
item.dc:creator: @Patrick_M_25 Patrick M 25
item.description:
@Patrick_M_25 wrote:

Ok, I made something that makes it so if you have 125 tokkul, and you use the tokkul on a doctors’ gown, you’ll make a fighter torso.

The problem is, if you just have 1 tokkul, you can still make the torso…

How would I make it so it doesn’t work unless you have 125?

Here’s what I’ve got:

if((itemUsed == 6529 && useWith == 430)) { deleteItem(6529, getItemSlot(6529), 125); deleteItem(430, getItemSlot(430), 1); addItem(14638, 1); sendMessage("You get a figher torso!"); }

Read full topic
